CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Final_Approved_Premi_Amount__c)), (Final_Approved_Premi_Amount__c * Discount__c) / 100, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Fixed_Premi_Amount__c)), (Fixed_Premi_Amount__c * Discount__c) / 100, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Premi_Amount__c)), (Premi_Amount__c * Discount__c) / 100, 0 ) ) )
CustomField.label: Discount Amount
